name: Awquard Hamdshaque
description:
Local 2 player game where you and a friend press and hold the keys on-screen corresponding to your player's color. The last standing with most keys pressed wins!

Note: Game will work better with an anti-ghosting keyboard, if you don't have a keyboard like that, don't worry, you can still play the game, however, if the game seems to freeze, you reached maximum keys pressed on your keyboard, we are sorry for the inconvinience!
